Самая бодрая часть серии! Каждая минута игры насыщена событиями, пазлами и динамичными боями! Одна только перестрелка с жуками в шахте доставляет кучу удовольствия! К прохождению обязательна!
PS - создатель ачивки с гномом - редкий САДИСТ!

Visually the best in Half-Life 2's run, and offers a nice change of scenery from the drab brown of City 17. Probably the most story rich of Half-Life 2's run, exploring more about the resistance, making connections to another Valve title that I won't mention in case you somehow never played these two games, providing an air of mystery about the G-Man that was noticeably absent from Episode 1, and leaving us all on a cliff hanger that to this day that still leaves us, over a decade later, scratching our heads wondering what they could be doing next. 

Half-Life 2 focused a lot on how the world ended up the way it did during Gordon's absence, Episode 1 focused more on what was going on in the present as the resistance began their uprising, and Episode 2 focuses more on what the future of the series could potentially hold, unforeseen consequences and all.

Like the other two in this series, of course I'd recommend Episode 2. Just play through the others first.

Half-life 2: Episode Two is a great follow-up to Episode One, and also more inventive than Episode One. There's new enemies, new forest ambience that I really like, also more heavy driven narrative story. I really hope that I still alive to witness Half-Life 3 or at least episode three lol. 8/10 for the score, of course, very recommended if you enjoy Half-Life series.

While this game is good and fun i think it's highly overrated for what it is. 
The gunplay is standard Half-Life/Counter Strike.
The graphics are good for their time.
The physics are THE highlight in this game ofc.
But the story... i don't know if they tried to take themselves too seriously or not. I am probably too much into sci-fi but this game never hit me as anything more than, well , mediocre. I'm gonna get flak for this but i guess people haven't ever read Sci-fi books or watched old films before playing this to realize its not even original or even great.
Also cliffhangers are a marketing strategy (especially in this case) and sadly here it worked like a charm.

Still, as a package the game is good for what it is. If you want fun with gunplay and GMOD physics this is your go-to.

Half-Life 2: Episode Two // Самая сложная ачивка в моей жизни.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2632131002

Я готов отдать должное Valve, ведь эта компания, которая бросает игрокам безумные испытания. Half-Life 2: Episode Two скрывает в себе сразу 3 безумно сложные ачивки:
1) Маленький космонавт - пронести через всю игру гнома и посадить его в ракету
2) Выкопать личинок - уничтожить 333 личинки
3) Страж порядка - не дать страйдерам уничтожить постройки в роще.

Я прошёл игру на 100% достижений с первого прохождения и это было невозможно. Никогда в других играх я не сталкивался с настолько трудным достижением, как "Маленький космонавт", посмотрев на эту ачивку становится ясно, почему игроки так сильно любят серию Half-Life. Начиная с оригинальной игры и заканчивая ep 2 количество безумных достижение увеличивается в геометрической прогрессии. В оригинале самой сложной ачивкой была "Следопыт", где нужно было найти 45 тайников разбросанных по всей игре, в ep 1 - "Одна пуля", пройти игру с единым выстрелом и в ep 2 - "Маленький космонавт". Valve словно глумится над игроками говоря "А пусть пройдёт игру без огнестрельного оружия! Нет-нет! Пусть тащит через всю игру гнома!" 

Пройдя Half-Life 2: Episode Two на 100% я чувствую удовлетворяющее блаженство. Это чувство невозможно передать, я могу лишь предложить тебе, мой читатель, проделать тот же путь пройдя на 100% оригинальную игру и её сиквелы.
Oui.

Uscirà mai Half-Life 3? Questo è il dilemma che accompagna da molti anni tutti i fan della saga e gli appassionati di videogiochi. Nell'attesa ho voluto rigiocare i capitoli precedenti e quindi anche Episode Two. Una meravigliosa espansione, che introduce un paio di nuovi nemici e va a limare il comparto tecnico e l'IA. Ma quello che rende questa espansione degna di nota, è lo sviluppo della trama e le situazioni che ci troveremo ad affrontare strada facendo. Il mondo di gioco, alcune battaglie memorabili e diversi colpi di scena, sono sempre perfettamente cadenzati. In Episode Two infatti si raggiungono picchi di spettacolarità a più riprese e l'azione è sempre al massimo. Resta solo l'amaro in bocca per un finale assolutamente aperto e che, speriamo presto, possa avere seguito con un nuovo capitolo canonico della serie.

This episode is much better than the first one. I love the stylistic change from fun, but repeatable old town and gloomy canals of HL2:E1 to forests and roads, spaces with a lot of free air to breath yet saturated with dangerous enemies. Episode 2 in some way is very similar to the original HL2, but it brings so many new things to the table and they ultimately make it look like a stand alone, full-flegged Half Life title. The story is as always on point and it's such a shame that Valve decided not to continue the creation of Episode 3. With that being said, this game is basically what people love in HL2 and it's definetely worth playing til this day, despite of never coming solution. 𝟵/𝟭𝟬

[h1]¿Dónde está el Episodio 3?[/h1]

Después de HL2 y el fraude del Episodio 1, HL2 Episodio 2 nos ofrece el mismo mundo que ya conocemos, pero con más acción, y algunas mejoras que hacen que merezca la pena jugarlo.

Al contrario que el Ep1, este episodio se atreve a innovar un poco y nos encontramos con nuevos enemigos y escenarios distintos.
Visualmente es mejor que los anteriores. Y a nivel de ritmo, las fases son bastante emocionantes la mayor parte del tiempo, y la duración total del juego es correcta.
No supone tanta novedad como el primer HL2, pero aún así sigue sorprendiendo.

Hay algunas decisiones menores que no entenderé como que ¿cómo se justifica que empieces cada nuevo episodio sin armas? ¿Se ha estrellado el tren y de repente has perdido todo lo que llevabas?
O que introduzcan un claro tutorial al final de partida casi, de cómo disparar unas bombas a los zancudos. ¿Es que no hemos aprendido nada de cómo introducir las mecánicas al jugador?

Lo peor y por lo que se merece un negativo: deja la historia completamente abierta. Incluso los comentarios de los desarrolladores mencionan que se terminará en el episodio 3, pero este se canceló, y mucho me temo que no lo veremos jamás y no veremos cómo acaba la historia.

Si te gustó Half-Life 2, muy posiblemente te guste este también. Pero ten en cuenta que si te interesa la historia, el juego se queda completamente a medias.

It's good.

A welcome continuation of the Half Life series, I still enjoy playing this game. The story is still compelling and relevant to events of the original Half Life. Combat is challenging without being ridiculously so, and the variety of weapons is still good - the gravity gun being my favourite. I do miss the lab setting and sense of discovery that was so central to the original HL, but here the environments are larger and still offer plenty of opportunity to explore.
one word "strider"

A great follow up to the already titular Half Life 2 and Half Life 2 Episode 1. 
Lengthwise, it is longer than Episode 1, yet still shorter than the main game; but I really enjoyed every second of it. No new additions to the game were made, except just some new enemies, a goddamn gno... Gnome Chomsky, where are you heading at? I NEED YOU IN THE ROCKET!

The Hunters are really a way to challenge the players, as these are the toughest enemies yet beside Striders and Gunships. Alyx plays a much bigger role now, if we consider her role from Half Life: Alyx to be canon.
Otherwise, just another episode with Half Life 2 formula.
In all seriousness, the last section was difficult and fun.
Sad that the last episode was cancelled.

[b]14년째, 우리들의 마음 속에서 머무르고 있는 첫사랑.[/b] 

《바이오쇼크》, 《보더랜드》, 《콜 오브 듀티》, 《둠 리부트》, 《크라이시스》, 《헤일로》 등 내노라 하는 다양한 상대를 만나고 다녔어도 여전히 잊혀지지 않는 사람. 나이가 듦으로써, 그 매력이 농후하게 익어 젊은 사람들조차 끌어 당기는 마성을 지닌 사람. 지나간 추억을 되새길 때마다 더욱 간절히 보고 싶어지는 사람. 가상의 현실에서, 예전보다 더 멀끔해진 모습으로 우리의 마음을 잠시 어루만지고 스쳐간 사람. 세 번째의 만남이 이루어진다면 모든 걸 차치하고 힘껏 달려가 꼭 안아 주고 싶은 사람······.

[b]14년째, 우리가 기다리는 첫사랑, [i]고든 프리맨.[/i][/b]
